title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Off-duty pilot who tried to cut flight’s engines midair released without prison time
items.description: A federal judge has decided that a former Alaska Airlines pilot who tried to cut the engines of a passenger flight in 2023 will serve no additional pr...

items.title: 'Charlotte's Web' author's relative upset with use of title in immigration crackdown
items.description: The Trump administration has a name for its immigration sweep in North Carolina’s largest city

items.title: Man charged with murder in shooting of Oakland football coach and 'Last Chance U' star John Beam
items.description: A 27-year-old man has been charged with murder in the shooting death of former Oakland football coach John Beam

items.title: OJ Simpson estate accepts $58M claim from Goldmans but payment would be a fraction

items.title: EPA moves to limit scope of clean water law to reduce amount of wetlands it covers
items.description: The Environmental Protection Agency says it is redefining the scope of the nation’s bedrock clean water law to limit the amount of wetlands it covers
